alert.note: Alert for St. Charles; Warren (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 01 at 5:16PM CDT until July 01 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of east central Missouri, including the following counties, Saint Charles and Warren. * WHEN...Until 830 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 516 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Wentzville, Warrenton, Wright City, Truesdale, Innsbrook, Josephville, Flint Hill and Foristell.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
